title: How Do I Save Battery Power?
answer:
To save battery power, touch Power saving mode in Settings, or perform the following  

operations as required:  

? Press to lock the screen when you are not using your phone.  

? Touch > Settings > Display > Screen timeout to set Screen timeout to a small  

value.  

? Touch > Settings > Display > Brightness to set Brightness to a small value.  

? Touch > Settings > Wireless & networks, and clear Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to turn  

off Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.  

? Touch > Settings > Accounts & sync, and clear Background data and Auto-sync  

to disable background data synchronization.  

? Touch > Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and clear Data  

enabled to disable data services, or set Data Switch to Off in the notification bar.  

? Touch > Settings > Location & security, and clear Use GPS satellites to disable  

GPS functions
